description:
GameFly GameCenter is the ultimate video games application for Palm Pre™ or Pixi™. GameCenter gives you access to over 7,000 video games across all current consoles, handhelds, and Palm webOS devices, putting the most popular games, new releases and 'coming soon' titles right at your fingertips. Get all the information you need, including up-to-the minute news, release dates, user reviews, critic reviews, gameplay controls, cheats and codes, and a whole lot more.
 
Features:
- Access to the largest videogame information resource in the App Catalog.
- More than 7,000 video game titles across all major platforms, including Palm webOS, PlayStation 3, PlayStation 2, Xbox 360, Nintendo DS, Nintendo Wii, PSP, Xbox, Game Boy Advance, and GameCube.
- Watch the latest game trailers for the hottest titles.
- Check out thousands of video game images and screenshots.
- Add upcoming game release dates to your Palm Calendar.
- Featured video games from EA, Activision, Ubisoft, THQ and other popular publishers.
- Game description, release date, platform availability, user reviews, critic reviews from IGN, cheat codes, gameplay controls, game specs, ESRB ratings, game videos, and screenshots.
- Breaking game news and previews and reviews for console, handheld and PC games from sites like Shacknews.com.
- Ability to share the latest games and news articles via SMS and email.
- GameFly members can sign into their GameFly account and manage their GameQ.
 
GameCenter is brought to you by GameFly, the #1 online video game rental service. 
 
Try it now, it’s FREE!
